privacySecurity.title: üîí Privacy & Security
privacySecurity.intro: Your privacy is important to us. Here's how we protect your data:

clientSide.title: 100% Client-Side Processing
clientSide.desc: All tool processing happens in your browser. Your data (JSON, Base64, Hash, etc.) is never sent to our servers.

analytics.title: Google Analytics 4
analytics.desc: We use Google Analytics to understand how the site is used (pages visited, session duration). No personal data or tool content is tracked.

noAccount.title: No Account Required
noAccount.desc: We don't require registration. No email, password, or personal information needed.

securityHeaders.title: Security Headers
securityHeaders.desc: CSP, HSTS, Permissions-Policy configured for maximum security (9/10 security score).

auditable.title: Open Source & Auditable
auditable.desc: The code is public on GitHub. You can verify yourself that data stays in the browser and there are no backdoors.

contribute.q: How can I contribute to the project?
contribute.a: THEJORD.IT is open source! You can contribute by opening issues, proposing features, or submitting pull requests on GitHub. Read our Contributing Guide for more information.

security.a: Absolutely! All THEJORD.IT tools work entirely in the browser. No data is ever sent to our servers. Read our Security Policy.

selfHost.a: Of course! The project is open source and includes Docker and Kubernetes configurations. Find instructions in the README.

cost.q: How much does it cost to use THEJORD.IT?
cost.a: THEJORD.IT is completely free and always will be. No premium plans, no usage limits, no registration required.

request.q: Can I request a new tool?
request.a: Certainly! Open a feature request on GitHub or contact us via email. We evaluate all proposals!

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.p1: Welcome to THEJORD.IT ("we", "our" or "the site"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy.
intro.p2: This Privacy Policy describes the types of information we collect from you or that you provide when you visit the thejord.it website and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.

analytics.title: 2.1 Navigation Data (Google Analytics)
analytics.intro: We use Google Analytics 4 to collect information about how you use our site, including:
items: Country and city of origin (based on anonymized IP address)
Traffic source (Google search, direct link, etc.)
analytics.anonymization: IP Anonymization: We use Google Analytics' IP anonymization feature, which removes the last octet of your IP address before it is stored.

local.title: 2.2 Locally Processed Data
local.desc: All data you enter into our tools (JSON, Base64, text, etc.) is processed exclusively in your browser. It is never sent to our servers or third parties.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the collected information to:

items.improve: Improve the site: Understand which tools are most used to prioritize development
items.optimize: Optimize experience: Analyze user behavior to improve the interface
items.strategy: Strategic decisions: Decide which languages to support, which countries to target, etc.
items.monitor: Monitor performance: Identify technical issues and loading times

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.intro: We use the following types of cookies:
cookies.consent: Consent Cookie: To remember your cookie choice (365 days)
cookies.analytics: Google Analytics Cookies: To collect analytics data (see official documentation)
cookies.manage: You can decline cookies at any time through your browser settings or the site's cookie banner.

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.noSale: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data with third parties.
sharing.google: Data collected through Google Analytics is subject to Google's Privacy Policy.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.intro: If you reside in the European Union, you have the following rights:
rights.access: Right of access: You can request a copy of the data we have about you
rights.rectification: Right to rectification: You can request correction of inaccurate data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure: You can request deletion of your data
rights.objection: Right to object: You can object to the processing of your data
rights.portability: Right to portability: You can request your data in a readable format
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@thejord.it

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.intro: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data, including:

thirdParty.title: 8. Links to Third-Party Sites
thirdParty.desc: Our site may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites. We recommend reading their privacy policies.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.desc: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
